column2: PFSweb, Inc. engages in the provision of global commerce solutions. The company is headquartered in Allen, Texas and currently employs 2,300 full-time employees. The firm's service offerings include Website design, creation and integration, digital agency and marketing, e-commerce technologies, order management, customer care, logistics and fulfillment, financial management and professional consulting. The company operates through two segments: PFSweb, and Business and Retail Connect. PFSweb is a global provider of various infrastructure, technology and digital agency solutions and operates as a service fee business. In the Business and Retail Connect segment, subsidiaries of the Company purchase inventory from clients and resell the inventory to client customers. Its solutions support direct-to-consumer (DTC), business-to-business (B2B) and retail sales channels. The company markets its solutions as PFSweb's End2End eCommerce solution.
